annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We, the members of HON INDUSTRIES, are dedicated to creating long-term value for all of our stakeholders, to exceeding our customers' expectations, and to making our company a great place to work. We will always treat each other, as well as customers, suppliers, shareholders, and our communities, with fairness and respect.
annotations.translation: 作为鸿工业的成员，我们致力于为所有利益相关者创造长期价值，超越客户的期望，并使我们的公司成为良好的工作场所。我们将始终公平和尊重彼此以及客户、供应商、股东和我们的社区。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Our success depends upon business simplification, rapid continuous improvement, and innovation in every-thing we do, individual and collective integrity, and the relentless pursuit of the following long-standing beliefs:
annotations.translation: 我们的成功取决于业务简化、快速持续改进、我们所做的每一件事的创新、个人和集体的诚信，以及对以下长期信念的不懈追求：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We pursue mutually profitable relationships with customers and suppliers. Only when our company achieves an adequate profit can the other elements of this Vision be realized.
annotations.translation: 我们追求与客户和供应商的互利关系。只有当我们公司获得足够的利润时，才能实现这一愿景的其他要素。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We create long-term value for shareholders by earning financial returns significantly greater than our cost of capital and pursuing profitable growth opportunities. We will safeguard our shareholders' equity by maintaining a strong balance sheet to allow flexibility in responding to a continuously changing market and business environment.
annotations.translation: 我们通过赚取远高于资本成本的财务回报并追求盈利增长机会，为股东创造长期价值。我们将通过维持强劲的资产负债表来保护股东权益，以便灵活应对不断变化的市场和商业环境。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We pursue profitable growth on a global basis in order to provide continued job opportunities for members and finan-cial success for all stakeholders.
annotations.translation: 我们追求全球范围内的盈利增长，以便为会员提供持续的就业机会，并为所有利益相关者提供财务成功。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We provide reliable products and services of high quality and brand value to our end-users. Our products and services exceed our customers' expectations and enable our distributors and our company to make a fair profit.
annotations.translation: 我们为最终用户提供可靠的高品质和品牌价值的产品和服务。我们的产品和服务超越客户的期望，使我们的经销商和我们的公司能够获得公平的利润。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We pursue a participative environment and support a culture that encourages and recognizes excellence, active involvement, ongoing learning, and contributions of each member; that seeks out and values diversity; and that attracts and retains the most capable people who work safely, are motivated, and are devoted to making our company and our members successful.
annotations.translation: 我们追求参与式环境，并支持鼓励和认可卓越、积极参与、持续学习和每个成员贡献的文化;寻求并重视多样性;这吸引并留住了最有能力的人，他们安全地工作，有动力，并致力于使我们的公司和我们的会员取得成功。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We conduct our business in a way that sustains the well-being of society, our environment, and the economy in which we live and work. We follow ethical and legal business practices. Our company supports our volunteer efforts and provides charitable contributions so that we can actively participate in the civic, cultural, educational, environmental, and governmental affairs of our society.
annotations.translation: 我们开展业务的方式能够维护我们生活和工作的社会、环境和经济的福祉。 我们遵循道德和法律的商业惯例。 我们的公司支持志愿者工作，并提供慈善捐款，以便我们能够积极参与社会的公民、文化、教育、环境和政府事务。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: When our company is appreciated by its members, favored by its customers, supported by its suppliers, respected by the public, and admired by its shareholders, this Vision is fulfilled.
annotations.translation: 当我们的公司受到其成员的赞赏、客户的青睐、供应商的支持、公众的尊重和股东的钦佩时，这个愿景就实现了。

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: OUR VISION
annotations.translation: 我们的愿景

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL BE PROFITABLE.
annotations.translation: 我们将盈利。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL CREATE LONG-TERM VALUE FOR SHAREHOLDERS.
annotations.translation: 我们将为股东创造长期价值。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL PURSUE PROFITABLE GROWTH.
annotations.translation: 我们将追求盈利增长。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL BE A SUPPLIER OF QUALITY PRODUCTS AND SERVICES.
annotations.translation: 我们将成为优质产品和服务的供应商。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL BE A GREAT PLACE TO WORK.
annotations.translation: 我们会是个很棒的工作场所。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WE WILL BE A RESPONSIBLE CORPORATE CITIZEN.
annotations.translation: 我们将成为负责任的企业公民。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: TO OUR STAKEHOLDERS:
annotations.translation: 致我们的利益相关者：

annotations.label: Page-footer
annotations.text: HON INDUSTRIES Inc. (HNI)
annotations.translation: HON 工业有限公司 (HNI)

annotations.label: Page-footer
annotations.text: 414 East Third Street, P.O. Box 1109, Muscatine, IA 52761-0071
annotations.translation: 爱荷华州马斯卡廷市东三街 414 号，邮政信箱 1109 52761-0071

annotations.label: Page-footer
annotations.text: www.honi.com
annotations.translation: www.honi.com
